nodes.bodyText: Perhaps use the TypeScript ProcessInstanceState enum?
@Sara4994 this enum already exists in types.tsx, see: https://github.com/kiegroup/kogito-apps/blob/master/packages/management-console/src/graphql/types.tsx#L271

We would need this as there are two elements Icon and Moment, we need to rap both... And empty will not create any space or empty div while rendering on browser... <> it is same as <React.Fragment> just to rap when there are more than one element returns
